text: Adventure (Swedish: Äventyret) is a 1936 Swedish drama movie directed by Per- Axel Branner and was based on the 1913 play The Beautiful Adventure by Gaston Arman de Caillavet, Robert de Flers and Étienne Rey. It stars Karin Swanström, Tutta Rolf, Olof Winnerstrand, Elsa Carlsson, Håkan Westergren, Frida Winnerstrand, Irma Christenson, Elsa Ebbesen. ==Other websites== * Category:1936 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies based on plays
title: Adventure (1936 movie)
